page.title: 13Shops near Holbeach Bank
page.content: There are no big shops in our area. In Holbeach Bank, there is one small sweet shop in someone's house. They sell sweets, cigarettes, crisps, ice cream and cans of food. In Saracen's Head there is a butcher's shop.They have their own abattoir and make their own sausages and pies, and sell joints of meat and chops.There are Post Offices in Saracen's Head and Moulton Seas End .They sell all sorts of groceries.There are two mobile shops that visit the villages. One is a baker's and the other a grocer's .The baker also sells from his own home.For their main shopping, people have to go to supermarkets in Holbeach and Spalding where there are other small shops.If they want to see a lot of shops they have to travel 15km to Boston,25 km to King's Lynn or 40km'to Peterborough.
